headline: Is It Too Late To Consider Teledyne Technologies (TDY) After Strong Share Price Gains?
summary: If you are wondering whether Teledyne Technologies at around US$660 per share is still offering value, or if most of the upside is already reflected in the price, this article is written for that exact question. Teledyne's share price recently closed at US$660.29, with returns of 2.0% over 7 days, 17.4% over 30 days, 27.3% year to date, 34.8% over 1 year, 50.4% over 3 years, and 62.7% over 5 years. Recent performance is therefore an important part of the valuation story. Recent coverage...

headline: Is Teledyne’s FLIR Scale And New Space Sensor Awards Altering The Investment Case For TDY?
summary: In recent days, Teledyne Technologies announced new awards to supply infrared focal plane modules for the Space Development Agency’s Tracking Layer Tranche 3 satellites and highlighted the scale, vertical integration, and product launches of its Teledyne FLIR OEM thermal imaging business across defense, industrial, and automotive markets. These developments underscore how Teledyne is positioning its FLIR and space-sensor operations as low-risk, high-complexity suppliers for critical national...
